title.en: Prayer to Jamyang Khyentse Chökyi Lodrö

text.en: A great treasury of the knowing wisdom of all the victorious ones
text.en-trans: gyal kün khyenpé yeshe ter chenpo

text.en: Was the Mañjughoṣa guru with the power of knowledge and love.1
text.en-trans: jamyang lama khyen dang tsewé wang

text.en: And you are the nirmāṇakāya emanation of his enlightened activity—
text.en-trans: dé yi trinlé namrol trulpé ku

text.en: Lodrö Gyatso, at your feet I pray.
text.en-trans: lodrö gyatsö zhab la solwa deb

text.en: May the three secrets of this supreme protector long remain secure,
text.en-trans: gönpo chok gi sang sum yündu ten

text.en: May he guide and care for me in all my births and lives to come
text.en-trans: kyé dang tserab küntu jezung né

text.en: And sustain me with nectar-like teachings on the supreme vehicle,
text.en-trans: tek chok sung gi dütsi tsowa dang

text.en: And may his blessings and primordial wisdom infuse my heart.
text.en-trans: jinlab yeshe nying la jukpar shok
